channel.title: Llama2 on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Llama2 on Arrans github.io

item.title: ollama/ollama
item.description: Get up and running with OpenAI gpt-oss, DeepSeek-R1, Gemma 3 and other models.

item.title: menloresearch/jan
item.description: Jan is an open source alternative to ChatGPT that runs 100% offline on your computer

item.title: Mobile-Artificial-Intelligence/maid
item.description: Maid is a cross-platform Flutter app for interfacing with GGUF / llama.cpp models locally, and with Ollama and OpenAI models remotely.

item.title: haotian-liu/LLaVA
item.description: [NeurIPS'23 Oral] Visual Instruction Tuning (LLaVA) built towards GPT-4V level capabilities and beyond.

item.title: getumbrel/llama-gpt
item.description: A self-hosted, offline, ChatGPT-like chatbot. Powered by Llama 2. 100% private, with no data leaving your device. New: Code Llama support!

item.title: h2oai/h2o-llmstudio
item.description: H2O LLM Studio - a framework and no-code GUI for fine-tuning LLMs. Documentation: https://docs.h2o.ai/h2o-llmstudio/

item.title: rabilrbl/llamafile-builder
item.description: A simple github actions script to build a llamafile and uploads to huggingface
